LanguageData.DinoPenis.label: dinosaur penis
LanguageData.DinoPenis.description: A penis that is very wide, but not very tall. Its flatened shape is used to spread apart the orifice while the semen comes from the cloaca at the base of the penis.
LanguageData.DinoVagina.label: dinosaur vagina
LanguageData.DinoVagina.description: A vagina with a tough hide on the outside.
LanguageData.DinoAnus.label: dinosaur anus
LanguageData.DinoAnus.description: An anus with a tough hide on the outside.
